name: SignPowerShellScripts
description: Signs powershell scripts and modules with a specified cert
author: Black Marble

inputs.name: RootDirectory
inputs.label: Source Folder
inputs.helpMarkDown: The source folder that the validations will be run from. Use [variables](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=550988) if files are not in the repo. Example: $(agent.builddirectory)

inputs.name: CertificatePath
inputs.label: Certificate Path
inputs.helpMarkDown: The path to the certificate to use. It can either be a normal file path to a cer or the path to location in Cert:\ drive.

inputs.name: Filter
inputs.label: Filter
inputs.helpMarkDown: Filter for files to validate. Accepts a comma seperated array and wildcards, e.g. *.ps1, *.psm1 etc

inputs.name: Exclude
inputs.label: Exclude Files
inputs.helpMarkDown: Any files to exclude from the validation. Accepts a comma seperated array and wildcards.
